content:
DataObjectSettingDataEventHandler Delegate

In this Article

Represents a method that will handle the stem.Windows.DataObject.SettingData attached event.

Syntax

Declaration

public delegate void DataObjectSettingDataEventHandler(object sender, DataObjectSettingDataEventArgs e);

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • System.Delegate
  • DataObjectSettingDataEventHandler

Remarks

The <xref:System.Windows.DataObject.SettingData> event occurs when an attempt is made to add a data format to the data object during a copy operation.

A <xref:System.Windows.DataObject.SettingData> event handler method is typically used to apply copy command optimization by filtering unwanted or unneeded data formats from being applied to a DataObject.
